alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 9:56AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marion, northwestern Fulton and northern Baxter Counties through 1030 AM CST... At 956 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Flippin, or near Bull Shoals, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Arkawana... Ott... Ozark Regional Airport... Gamaliel Landing... Fawn Park... Bull Shoals State Park... Colfax... Cotter... Midway in Baxter County... Fairview in Marion County... Vidette... Clarkridge... Gamaliel... Three Brothers... Henderson... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
